query:
ALTER TABLE bonusPolicies 
ADD COLUMN salaryMultiplierPercent INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 100,
ADD COLUMN minMultiplierPercent INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 50,
ADD COLUMN maxMultiplierPercent INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 200,
ADD COLUMN minPerformanceRating INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN minTenureMonths INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN requiresGoalCompletion BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN minGoalCompletionRate INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN validFrom DATE DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN validUntil DATE DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN approvalStatus ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN approvedBy INT DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN approvedAt DATETIME DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN createdBy INT DEFAULT NULL
